mapper.insert: insert into employee(ep_id, ep_name, ep_email, ep_phone_num, ep_salary) values(#{member.ep_id}, #{member.ep_name}, #{member.ep_email}, #{member.ep_phone_num}, #{member.ep_salary})
mapper.select: select dm_name from department where dm_num = #{ep_dm_num}
select po_name from position where po_num = #{ep_po_num}
select st_type from status where st_num = #{ep_st_num}
mapper.update: update employee set ep_phone_num = #{ep_phone_num} where ep_id = #{ep_id}
update employee set ep_dm_num = #{dept} where ep_id = #{id}
update employee set ep_salary = #{salary} where ep_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into salaryhistory(sh_payday, sh_ep_id, sh_pa_type, sh_type_detail, sh_salary) values(#{sh_payday},#{sh_ep_id},#{sh_pa_type},#{sh_type_detail},#{sh_salary})
insert into transfer(tr_date, tr_reason, tr_ep_id, tr_dm_num) values(#{tr_date},#{tr_reason},#{tr_ep_id},#{tr_dm_num})
